Description.Text: Marine Bay Sands Hotels is part of the Marina Bay Sands integrated resort fronting Marina Bay. The 20 hectare resort features hotel rooms, convention-exhibition centre, The Shoppes mall, an Art & Science museum, two Sands Theatres, Six "celebrity chef" restaurants, two floating pavilions, a casino and a SkyPark. The SkyPark feature the magnificent infinity swimming pool, restaurant, lounge and an observation deck that provides unobstructed 360 degree views of the city skyline and the sea. Hotel guests have free access to the observation deck during their stay. Shoppers will be thrilled by the world's most coveted designer labels in The Shoppes mall. Food lovers are pamper by the wide range of restaurants in the integrated resort. From the high end restaurants operated by Celebrity Chefs to fine dining, to casual dining and simple food kiosks. Guests are pamper with Catalan, French, American, European, Japanese, Chinese and many others cuisine of their choice. sg/Oct10

The hotel is centrally located, with easy access to the shopping area, attraction and the financial district. Raffles City Mall, Citylink Mall, Marina Square, Suntec City Mall, Suntec Convention Centre and Esplanade - Theater By the Bay are within walking distance from the hotel. Marina Bay area is particularly known for its view of the bay and affable atmosphere.

Deluxe rooms located close the heart of the action in tower 3 with average room size of 39 square metres, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows. The rooms carry modern contemporary design, comes with 2 super single size bed or a king size bed. Rooms with the garden view will come with a balcony. Complimentary coffee and tea making facilities are provided in the room. Wired or wireless internet access are available at a charge. Deluxe room with city view available located on the 19th floor and higher which has all the comforts and amenities of deluxe room.
Three 55 storey cascading hotel towers crowned by a 340m long SkyPark.

Hotel operates 5 food and beverages outlets, an espresso bar to an all-day dining restaurant servicing buffet and a-la-carte menu, the lobby lounge that serves light fare, afternoon tea, wine and cocktail, the high-end Chinese restaurant and a lobby bar that offers mood and vibe music.
The lobby are bright and spacious. All the three towers lobby are interlink, restaurants and lounge sit in between the link.
